Note: Throwing away your only weapon is not a good idea.

Maybe consider staying away from villages for the time being...

advancements.husbandry.safely_harvest_ho: §7Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Bottle without aggravating the bees

farmersdelight.advancement.craft_knife.d: §7Craft a Knife to forage more goods from plants and animals
farmersdelight.advancement.plant_rice.de: §7Plant Rice grains in a shallow puddle
farmersdelight.advancement.plant_all_cro: §7Cultivate every fruit, vegetable, fungus or root you can find!
farmersdelight.advancement.get_ham.desc: §7Use a Knife to extract bigger cuts of meat from Pigs
farmersdelight.advancement.harvest_straw: §7Harvest grassy plants and crops with a Knife to obtain Straw
farmersdelight.advancement.get_rich_soil: §7Leave some Organic Compost to decompose until it becomes Rich Soil. Mushrooms might help!
farmersdelight.advancement.get_mushroom_: §7Plant Mushrooms on Rich Soil under dark, watch a colony form, then shear it!
farmersdelight.advancement.obtain_nether: If You Can't Take the Heat...
§7Spend a whole Netherite Ingot to upgrade your knife! Or get out of the kitchen.
farmersdelight.advancement.place_campfir: §7Place down a Campfire to keep you warm at night
farmersdelight.advancement.place_cooking: §7Put down a Cooking Pot and start preparing meals!
farmersdelight.advancement.drink_hot_coc: §7Clear away a harmful effect by drinking a bottle of Hot Cocoa
farmersdelight.advancement.eat_comfort_f: §7Soups and stews are great for warding off cold and sickness!
farmersdelight.advancement.eat_nourishin: §7A hearty plate of food will keep you nourished for a long time!
farmersdelight.advancement.place_feast.d: §7Some meals are best served on a table, to share with friends. Get your bowls ready!
farmersdelight.advancement.use_cutting_b: §7With a tool in hand, use it on a Cutting Board to split up some items
farmersdelight.advancement.master_chef.d: §7Eat a course of every meal available!
farmersdelight.jei.info.straw: §7A dry plant fiber used in crafting. Obtained by cutting grassy crops and plants with a Knife.
